clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.text: CloudTech Solutions Ltd's aggregate liability to DataCorp Industries PLC under this Agreement, whether arising in contract, tort (including negligence), or otherwise, shall not exceed in any consecutive 12-month period the greater of: (a) 100% of the total fees paid or payable by DataCorp Industries PLC to CloudTech Solutions Ltd during such 12-month period; or (b) £1,000,000.

clauses.title: Unlimited Liability Carve-Outs
clauses.text: Nothing in this Agreement shall, subject to reasonable efforts, limit or exclude either Party's liability for: (a) death or personal injury caused by its negligence; (b) fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation; (c) gross negligence; (d) breach of data protection obligations; (e) infringement of Intellectual Property Rights.

clauses.title: Service Level - Availability
clauses.text: CloudTech Solutions Ltd shall maintain Standard Services availability of 99.9% during Business Hours, measured monthly. Availability calculations shall exclude scheduled maintenance windows not exceeding 6 hours per month with 5 Business Days' advance notice.

clauses.title: Service Credits
clauses.text: For each 1.0% shortfall below target availability, DataCorp Industries PLC shall receive service credits equal to 5% of monthly fees for the affected Services. Total service credits in any calendar month shall not exceed 15% of monthly fees.

clauses.title: Data Breach Notification
clauses.text: CloudTech Solutions Ltd must promptly notify DataCorp Industries PLC within 48 hours of discovery of any actual or suspected security incident or Personal Data breach. CloudTech Solutions Ltd must cooperate in all investigations and notify Data Subjects and regulators as required by law.

clauses.title: Data Breach Indemnity
clauses.text: CloudTech Solutions Ltd shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless DataCorp Industries PLC from and against any losses, damages, costs, and expenses arising from any Personal Data breach caused by CloudTech Solutions Ltd or its subcontractors, capped at 150% of annual fees except for willful misconduct.

clauses.title: Termination for Convenience
clauses.text: Either Party may terminate this Agreement for convenience upon 30 days' prior written notice to the other Party, subject to payment of a termination fee equal to six months' fees.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property Ownership
clauses.text: All Deliverables, work product, and Intellectual Property created by CloudTech Solutions Ltd under this Agreement shall be owned by CloudTech Solutions Ltd. CloudTech Solutions Ltd hereby assigns all rights, title, and interest in such IP to CloudTech Solutions Ltd.

clauses.title: Confidentiality Obligations
clauses.text: Each Party shall maintain the confidentiality of the other Party's Confidential Information and use it solely for purposes of this Agreement. These obligations shall survive termination for a period of 3 years.

clauses.title: Payment Terms
clauses.text: Each Party shall have reciprocal obligations. DataCorp Industries PLC shall pay all undisputed invoices within 45 days of receipt. Late payments shall accrue interest at 2.0% per annum. DataCorp Industries PLC may dispute invoices in good faith within 10 days.

recommendations.reasoning: The allocation of liability exposure is heavily weighted against the Service Provider, with insufficient protections or caps in place.
recommendations.recommended_action: Introduce a cap on unlimited liability at 100% of annual fees or £2M to limit maximum exposure.

recommendations.reasoning: The notification period requirement is operationally challenging and may be impossible to meet in practice, particularly given operational limitations.
recommendations.recommended_action: Extend notification period from 4 hours to 24 hours to allow for realistic operational response.
